Detailed Description

A SeekBar is an extension of ProgressBar that adds a draggable thumb.

The user can touch the thumb and drag left or right to set the current progress level. Placing focusable widgets to the left or right of a SeekBar is discouraged.

The following example demonstrates how to use the SeekBar

 gaia::ui::SeekBar* mpSeekBar = new gaia::ui::SeekBar(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 // Set the current progress to the specified value.
 mpSeekBar->setProgress(100);
